document_data.name: City Guard of Fahhas
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Fahhas]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Searching".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 2,000 soldiers and 1,000 cavalry from the [[Sword of the True Gods]]. Other forces included 2,000 regular soldiers, 150 [[cleric]]s, and three 300-man units of [[mamluk]]s from the [[Devoted Mamluk Society]]. Fahhas' navy consisted of 5 large ships and 10 smaller vessels.
